DOC.HEADLINE: TENNIS ROUNDUP ; HEALTHY SAMPRAS WINS FIRST TOURNAMENT SINCE WIMBLEDON
DOC.TEXT: Pete Sampras used his big serve to complete a perfect tune-up for the ATP Tour World Championships , beating Magnus Larsson , 7-6 ( 7-5 ) , 6-4 , Sunday and retaining his $ 1.1 million European Community Championship title in Antwerp , Belgium . The $ 3 million tour-ending event featuring the top eight players in the world begins Tuesday in Frankfurt , Germany . Sampras , the world ' s No . 1 player , won a record ninth tournament this season , his first since Wimbledon . He didn ' t lose a set during the week and proved he is at his peak again after injuries slowed him this summer . * Anke Huber of Germany hung_on to defeat Mary Pierce of France , 6-0 , 6-7 ( 4-7 ) , 7-5 , for the championship of the $ 750 # 000 Virginia Slims of Philadelphia . Huber nearly blew a 4-0 lead in the third set before she settled_down for her third victory of the season . * Alexander Volkov of Russia won the $ 1.1 million Kremlin Cup tournament in Moscow , defeating Chuck Adams of the United States , 6-2 , 6-4 . * Alex Corretja of Spain won his first ATP Tour title , defeating Javier Frana of Argentina , 6-3 , 5-7 , 7-6 ( 7-5 ) , in the final of the $ 313 # 000 Topper Open in Buenos Aires . * UCLA ' s Jane Chi , ranked No . 2 in the NCAA , defeated teammate Keri Phebus , 6-4 , 6-4 , in the final of the Southern California Women ' s Tennis Regional Tournament at UC Irvine .
